allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: update types and filters for multi-account support - Phase 7

- Add discogsConnections array to ExtendedSession type
- Update admin users API to handle multiple connections
- Fix Next.js 15 async params pattern in connection routes
- Fix Prisma list relation filter \(isNot -> some\) in analytics

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add taxonomy with Discogs/MusicBrainz-aligned terminology

- Create docs/taxonomy.md with comprehensive glossary
- Adopt Discogs terms: Release, Master Release, Version, Instance, Collection, Folder
- Define Dave''s Records concepts: Stack, View, Curator, Connection
- Add UI terms: Gallery, Detail Modal, Filter Panel
- Include required Discogs API disclaimer
- Update CLAUDE.md to reference taxonomy

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(for domain in spun.com spun.fm spun.io spun.co getspun.com spunapp.com spunhq.com spunrecords.com spunwax.com wespun.com stacks.com stacks.fm stacks.io stacks.co mystacks.com thestacks.com stacksapp.com stacked.com waxstacks.com stackshq.com crates.com crates.fm crates.io crates.co mycrates.com thecrates.com cratesapp.com uncrated.com opencrates.com crateview.com)
Bash(then echo "AVAILABLE" else echo "TAKEN" fi done)
